t: Amazon
s: I am receiving an 8040 - Match Only Error on a variation. This variation has existed on Amazon for 7 years. It appears an unauthorized reseller uploaded a FeedFile causing the entire variation to get deleted. The issue is the Parent ASIN has been stamped with an incorrect brand ID.
